Creating a flight shopping tool focusing on efficiency for medical professionals.

2016 –Medical patient travel

Expedia, Inc. – Egencia Business Travel
Product Design, Web App
Role: Lead Product Designer, Front-End Specialist
Team: Oslo, Norawy & Paris, France
Goal: Create an efficient flight shopping tool to be used by medical professionals.
